Foxfingers huddled close to Razor Claw as the mutant transformed to his rap=
tor form. The thief tossed a mirror sensor to the side and made sure his da=
mpners were working properly. Razor Claw activated his forcefield protectin=
g the two from damage from the acid.

It wasn't long until the acid ate awa=
y at the mirror sensor ending the signals it was sending out. Any sensors i=
n the room would no longer detect any life forms. To all scanners the two w=
ere dead.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Airshadow Nightlight 
  T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, August 12, 2001 5:02 PM
  Subjec=
t: Ender/Mutants.


  Shivah/BlackFortress: 

  Shivah looked to Ender and =
said "I should admit, Ender, that that thing that I've done was pretty unpl=
easant" said Shivah camly and he added "Well Ender what of those factions a=
re worthy as allies? we need more allies, I have the feeling that we will n=
eed them" 

  BlackFortress defences started to act, several slide plates  =
appeared  from  the top of BlackFortress (BF is a dome) and  they covered a=
ll BlackFortress, even those plates close the hole that Foxfingers and Razo=
rclaws have done; That  was a extra  protection  that BlackFortress has, if=
 some one have opened a hole in extermal shield, this plates will cover the=
 damage at the same time that protect all BlackFortress. Letting the BlackF=
ortress members repair the damage while the Fortress in under Lava. 

  Fox=
fingers and Razorclaws where in a corritor and two slider walls  block the =
two directions that they could have followed. Now both was trapped  and fro=
m roof started to rain Acyd, that could destroy organic and metallic creatu=
res. 

  Shivah smiled when BlackFortress computer report that and said to =
Lunarpine "If you are a paceful group, why are two bots trapped inside Blac=
kFortress?'?? I've told you that you shouldn't try anything... now your two=
 friends will die due your impertinence!!!!!" 

  Now BlackFortress was cov=
ered by the lava.
